array.name: error_code_256
array.item: Can\’t connect the device enter OTA mode
1. Radio environment is extremely bad \n2. Android connect BLE device with BR/EDR channel \n3. Bluedroid exception

array.name: error_code_257
array.item: 1. I/O error, the probability is very low

array.name: error_code_258
array.item: Launch the GATT search service failure
1. Bluedroid exception, the probability is very low

array.name: error_code_259
array.item: Invokes the Java synchronization lock exceptions
1. Java exception, the probability is very low

array.name: error_code_260
array.item: 1. Probably other applications connection with the same device \n2. Bluedroid exception, the probability is very low

array.name: error_code_261
array.item: 1. Disconnect when send command \n2. If is Android4.4 system, get the error when half in upgrade, may be Bluedroid have GKI get buffer exception, please use the patch version up to 9377(The function of update connection parameters is added), or use the mobile phone above Android5.0

array.name: error_code_262
array.item: 1. Connect error device, the probability is very low

array.name: error_code_263
array.item: 1. Connect error device, the probability is very low

array.name: error_code_264
array.item: 1. Bluedroid exception, the probability is very low

array.name: error_code_265
array.item: 1. Radio environment is extremely bad \n2. Sent to the command of “entering OTA mode”, but can\’t scan the device, the possible reasons is the device are not yet enter the OTA mode

array.name: error_code_266
array.item: 1. Bluedroid exception, the probability is very low

array.name: error_code_267
array.item: 1. Send write request but return response error

array.name: error_code_268
array.item: 1. Bluedroid exception, the probability is very low

array.name: error_code_269
array.item: 1. Remote battery low to 60% \n2. Remote battery big to 110 but low to 140（For Huaiwei）

array.name: error_code_270
array.item: 1. Bluedroid exception, the probability is very low

array.name: error_code_271
array.item: 1. Bluedroid exception, the probability is very low

array.name: error_code_272
array.item: 1. Bluedroid exception, the probability is very low

array.name: error_code_273
array.item: 1. Occur when user did\’t active the image update in silent OTA update

array.name: error_code_274
array.item: Buffer Check retry times reach MAX

array.name: error_code_767
array.item: 1. AES Mismatch \n2. May be the remote device have problems in config memory allocation

array.name: error_code_2305
array.item: 1. Client if had be registered over
